products.name: Premium Salmon Dry Cat Food
products.description: Our Premium Salmon Dry Cat Food is crafted with real wild-caught salmon as the first ingredient. This grain-free formula is packed with omega fatty acids for a healthy coat and skin. Enhanced with probiotics for digestive health and antioxidants for immune support. Perfect for adult cats of all breeds.
products.shortDescription: Wild-caught salmon, grain-free formula with probiotics

products.name: Chicken & Turkey Wet Food Variety Pack
products.description: Treat your cat to a delicious variety of premium wet food. This pack includes 6 chicken and 6 turkey flavors, all made with real meat and wholesome vegetables. Grain-free and packed with moisture to support urinary health. Each can is perfectly portioned for a single meal.
products.shortDescription: 12-pack variety with chicken and turkey flavors

products.name: Crunchy Catnip Treats
products.description: Irresistible crunchy treats made with real catnip that cats go crazy for! These bite-sized snacks are perfect for training, rewarding, or just spoiling your feline friend. Low calorie formula means you can treat without the guilt. Made in the USA with no artificial flavors.
products.shortDescription: Crunchy, low-calorie treats with real catnip

products.name: Interactive Feather Wand Toy
products.description: Engage your cat's natural hunting instincts with this premium feather wand toy. Features a flexible 36-inch wand with a durable string and replaceable feather attachment. The realistic feather movement mimics prey and provides excellent exercise and mental stimulation.
products.shortDescription: 36-inch wand with realistic feather attachment

products.name: Deluxe Cat Scratching Post Tower
products.description: This multi-level scratching tower provides the ultimate scratching experience for your cat. Features natural sisal rope wrapped posts, plush platforms for lounging, and a cozy hideaway cave. Sturdy base prevents tipping while your cat climbs and scratches to their heart's content.
products.shortDescription: Multi-level tower with sisal posts and hideaway

products.name: Organic Catnip Mouse Trio
products.description: Set of three adorable plush mice filled with premium organic catnip. Each mouse features a different color and texture to keep your cat engaged. Durable stitching withstands batting, biting, and bunny kicks. The perfect size for carrying and tossing.
products.shortDescription: 3-pack plush mice with organic catnip filling

products.name: Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush
products.description: The ultimate grooming tool for cats of all coat types. Fine bent wire bristles gently remove loose fur, tangles, and mats without irritating the skin. The self-cleaning button retracts bristles to easily remove collected fur. Ergonomic handle provides comfortable grip during grooming sessions.
products.shortDescription: Easy-clean brush with retractable bristles

products.name: Gentle Oatmeal Cat Shampoo
products.description: Soothe and moisturize your cat's skin with this gentle oatmeal-based shampoo. Perfect for cats with sensitive or dry skin. The soap-free, pH-balanced formula cleanses without stripping natural oils. Light vanilla and coconut scent leaves your cat smelling fresh and clean.
products.shortDescription: Moisturizing shampoo for sensitive skin

products.name: Cozy Donut Cat Bed
products.description: Give your cat the ultimate comfort with this ultra-soft donut-shaped bed. The raised rim provides head and neck support while creating a sense of security. Luxuriously plush faux fur is self-warming and machine washable. Anti-slip bottom keeps the bed in place on any surface.
products.shortDescription: Ultra-soft round bed with raised rim

products.name: Expandable Airline-Approved Carrier
products.description: Travel with ease using this versatile expandable carrier. Meets most airline under-seat requirements when collapsed, and expands on one side to give your cat extra room at your destination. Multiple mesh windows for ventilation, padded shoulder strap, and fleece bedding included.
products.shortDescription: Expandable carrier that fits under airplane seats

products.name: Breakaway Safety Collar with Bell
products.description: Keep your cat safe and stylish with this adjustable breakaway collar. The quick-release buckle opens under pressure to prevent choking if the collar gets caught. Includes a small bell to help you locate your cat. Soft nylon is comfortable for all-day wear.
products.shortDescription: Adjustable collar with safety release buckle

products.name: Stainless Steel Double Bowl Set
products.description: Premium feeding station featuring two stainless steel bowls on a non-slip silicone mat. The elevated design promotes better posture and digestion. Dishwasher-safe bowls are rust-resistant and hygienic. Modern design complements any home d√©cor.
products.shortDescription: Elevated double bowl with silicone mat

products.name: Hooded Litter Box with Carbon Filter
products.description: Keep odors contained with this spacious hooded litter box. The built-in carbon filter absorbs odors before they escape. Swing door provides privacy for your cat while the transparent hood lets light in. Large size accommodates cats up to 15 lbs. Easy snap-on lid for simple cleaning.
products.shortDescription: Large covered box with odor-absorbing filter

products.name: Unscented Clumping Clay Litter
products.description: Superior clumping cat litter made from natural clay. Forms tight clumps for easy scooping and minimal waste. Unscented formula is perfect for sensitive cats and owners who prefer no added fragrances. 99% dust-free for a cleaner home and healthier breathing.
products.shortDescription: Natural clay litter with tight clumping action

products.name: Enzyme Stain & Odor Remover
products.description: Powerful enzymatic formula that eliminates pet stains and odors at the source. Works on urine, vomit, feces, and other organic messes. Safe for use on carpets, upholstery, hardwood, and more. The bio-enzymatic action continues working until the stain is completely eliminated.
products.shortDescription: Bio-enzymatic cleaner for all surfaces

products.name: Automatic Laser Toy
products.description: Keep your cat entertained even when you're busy with this automatic laser toy. Random patterns keep cats engaged and guessing. Multiple speed settings and auto shut-off timer. Silent motor won't disturb your household. Requires 3 AA batteries (not included).
products.shortDescription: Self-moving laser with random patterns

products.name: Kitten Starter Food
products.description: Specially formulated nutrition for growing kittens up to 12 months. High protein content supports muscle development while DHA promotes brain and vision development. Small kibble size perfect for tiny mouths. Complete and balanced for all the nutrients your kitten needs.
products.shortDescription: Complete nutrition for kittens up to 1 year

products.name: Dental Health Cat Treats
products.description: Crunchy treats designed to help clean teeth and freshen breath. The unique texture helps reduce tartar buildup while the added parsley freshens breath naturally. Chicken flavor cats love. Veterinarian recommended for daily dental care.
products.shortDescription: Tartar-fighting treats with fresh breath benefits

products.name: Window Perch Hammock
products.description: Give your cat the perfect spot to watch the world with this sturdy window perch. Heavy-duty suction cups support up to 30 lbs. Breathable mesh fabric keeps cats cool while lounging. Easy installation - no tools required. Space-saving design perfect for apartments.
products.shortDescription: Suction-mounted window seat for bird watching

products.name: Flea & Tick Spot Treatment
products.description: Veterinarian-strength flea and tick protection that lasts a full month. Easy-to-apply topical treatment kills fleas, ticks, and chewing lice. Waterproof formula stays effective even after bathing. For cats 8 weeks and older. Pack includes 3 monthly doses.
products.shortDescription: Monthly topical treatment - 3 pack
